org.apache.flink.mesos.configuration

类 MesosOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.mesos.configuration.MesosOptions

  • public class MesosOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    The set of configuration options relating to mesos settings.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> ARTIFACT_SERVER_PORT
      The config parameter defining the Mesos artifact server port to use.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> ARTIFACT_SERVER_SSL_ENABLED
      Config parameter to override SSL support for the Artifact Server.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> FAILOVER_TIMEOUT_SECONDS
      The failover timeout for the Mesos scheduler, after which running tasks are automatically shut down.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> INITIAL_TASKS
      The initial number of Mesos tasks to allocate.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> MASTER_URL
      The Mesos master URL.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> MAX_FAILED_TASKS
      The maximum number of failed Mesos tasks before entirely stopping the Mesos session / job on Mesos.
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_NAME 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_PRINCIPAL 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_ROLE 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_SECRET 
      static ConfigOption<java.lang.String> RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_USER

    • 字段详细资料

      • INITIAL_TASKS

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> INITIAL_TASKS
        The initial number of Mesos tasks to allocate.

      • MAX_FAILED_TASKS

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> MAX_FAILED_TASKS
        The maximum number of failed Mesos tasks before entirely stopping the Mesos session / job on Mesos.

        By default, we take the number of initially requested tasks.

      • MASTER_URL

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> MASTER_URL
        The Mesos master URL.

        The value should be in one of the following forms: 

         
     host:port
     zk://host1:port1,host2:port2,.../path
     zk://username:password@host1:port1,host2:port2,.../path
     file:///path/to/file (where file contains one of the above)

      • FAILOVER_TIMEOUT_SECONDS

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> FAILOVER_TIMEOUT_SECONDS
        The failover timeout for the Mesos scheduler, after which running tasks are automatically shut down.

      • ARTIFACT_SERVER_PORT

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Integer> ARTIFACT_SERVER_PORT
        The config parameter defining the Mesos artifact server port to use. Setting the port to 0 will let the OS choose an available port.

      • RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_NAME

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_NAME

      • RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_ROLE

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_ROLE

      • RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_PRINCIPAL

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_PRINCIPAL

      • RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_SECRET

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_SECRET

      • RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_USER

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.String> RESOURCEMANAGER_FRAMEWORK_USER

      • ARTIFACT_SERVER_SSL_ENABLED

        public static final ConfigOption<java.lang.Boolean> ARTIFACT_SERVER_SSL_ENABLED
        Config parameter to override SSL support for the Artifact Server.
